response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above $12,000. However, to facilitate a transaction and explore mutual benefits, I am offering it to you at an exclusive introductory price of $15,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully. If you're interested, we can schedule a demonstration to showcase the product's capabilities and discuss how it might fit into your needs. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 15000}
